messages.msgSnippet: Lovemary, ouch! You d better take care, too! Geesh... sounds painful :( Sarah ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
Lovemary,
ouch! You'd better take care, too! Geesh... sounds painful :(
Sarah


On Mon, 17 Dec 2001 17:28:16 EST, lite2yu@... wrote:
> In a message dated 12/17/2001 12:04:54 PM Eastern Standard Time,
>freeform@... writes:
>
>
>> Anyway, that's what we've been doing for a week.
>>
>> Dar
>>
>>
>
>my deepest sympathies dar. . . i cant type welkl. . . i burned my
>right hand
>pretty bad, but iddi wanrt u to know i am thinking of u.
>
>lovemary
>
>I cannot judge my own path and SELF, having the knowledge that I
>have chosen
>to come here to experience these specific issues and grow, learn,
>and
>Remember Who I Am.
>
